snippet: Illegal logging has largely stopped in the western Mexican wintering grounds of the monarch butterfly, and officials hope to apply similar methods to other forestry conflicts.
lead_paragraph: Illegal logging has largely stopped in the western Mexican wintering grounds of the monarch butterfly, and officials hope to apply similar methods to other forestry conflicts.

headline.seo: Mexico Reports Success Saving Butterfly Habitat
headline.main: Success Reported in Safeguarding a Butterfly Habitat
headline.print_headline: Success Reported in Safeguarding a Butterfly Habitat
